void AresNetEvent::AresNetEvent::Handlers::RaiseTrenchRedirectClick ( BuildingClass *  Source,
CellStruct *  Target 
) [static] 

00045                                                                                              {
00046         NetworkEvent * Event = new NetworkEvent();
00047         Event->Kind = AresNetEvent::aev_TrenchRedirectClick;
00048         Event->HouseIndex = byte(Source->Owner->ArrayIndex);
00049         byte *ExtraData = Event->ExtraData;
00050 
00051         NetID SourceObject, TargetCoords;
00052 
00053         TargetCoords.Pack(Target);
00054         memcpy(ExtraData, &TargetCoords, sizeof(TargetCoords));
00055         ExtraData += sizeof(TargetCoords);
00056 
00057         SourceObject.Pack(Source);
00058         memcpy(ExtraData, &SourceObject, sizeof(SourceObject));
00059         ExtraData += sizeof(SourceObject);
00060 
00061         Networking::AddEvent(Event);
00062         delete Event;
00063 }

void AresNetEvent::AresNetEvent::Handlers::RespondToTrenchRedirectClick ( NetworkEvent *  Event  )  [static] 

00065                                                                            {
00066         NetID *ID = reinterpret_cast<NetID *>(Event->ExtraData);
00067         if(CellClass * pTargetCell = ID->UnpackCell()) {
00068                 ++ID;
00069                 if(BuildingClass * pSourceBuilding = ID->UnpackBuilding()) {
00070                         /*
00071                                 pSourceBuilding == selected building the soldiers are in
00072                                 pTargetCell == cell the user clicked on; event fires only on buildings which showed the enter cursor
00073                         */
00074                         Debug::Log("Setting target coords of [%s] to cell at %d, %d\n", pSourceBuilding->Type->ID, pTargetCell->MapCoords);
00075 
00076                         BuildingExt::ExtData* sourceBuildingExt = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(pSourceBuilding);
00077                         BuildingClass* targetBuilding = pTargetCell->GetBuilding();
00078                         sourceBuildingExt->doTraverseTo(targetBuilding); // check has happened before the enter cursor appeared
00079                 }
00080         }
00081 
00082 }
